techmeme.title: Tavily, which is helping AI agents connect to live web data, raised a $20M Series A led by Insight Partners and Alpha Wave, taking its total funding to $25M (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
AppLovin Q2: revenue up 77% YoY to $1.26B, vs. $1.22B est., adjusted EBITDA up 99% YoY to $1.02B, and forecasts Q3 revenue above est.; APP drops 5%+ after hours (Adam Levine/Barron's Online)
Bumble reports Q2 revenue down 8% YoY to $248.2M, vs. $245.1M est., a $367M net loss, and total paying users down 8.7% YoY to 3.8M; BMBL falls 9%+ after hours (Kritika Lamba/Reuters)
Rillet, which is building AI ledger software to automate accounting tasks, raised a $70M Series B co-led by a16z and Iconiq, a source says at a ~$500M valuation (Aditya Soni/Reuters)
Trump Media says it is beta testing Truth Search AI, a new search feature powered by Perplexity, on the web version of Truth Social (Matthew Gault/404 Media)
